description: ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D Geometry Asset file definition.

Axle.description: The definition of vehicle axle based on the https://releases.asam.net/OpenSCENARIO/1.0.0/Model-Documentation/content/Axle.html[OpenSCENARIO XML vehicle axle definition].

maxSteering.description: Maximum steering angle which can be performed by the wheels on this axle. Unit: rad; Range: [0;PI], symmetrical.

wheelDiameter.description: Diameter of the wheels on this axle. Unit: meter; Range: ]0..inf[.

trackWidth.description: Distance of the wheels center lines at zero steering. Unit: meter; Range: [0..inf[.

positionX.description: Longitudinal position of the axle with respect to the vehicles center of the bounding box projected to the ground. Unit: meter; Range: [0..inf[.

positionZ.description: The z-position of the axle with respect to the vehicles center of the bounding box projected to the ground. Usually this is half of wheel diameter. Unit:meter; Range:[0..inf[.

metadata.description: The key meta information about the asset, including its identity, authorship, technical specifications, and legal details.

name.description: The display name of the asset, such as 'Car Model A' or 'Urban Scene 1'.

description.description: A concise summary of the asset's purpose or features in 2 - 3 sentences.

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier for the asset in 8-4-4-4-12 format, see cite:[uui]. The uuid stays the same, even if version is updated.

assetVersion.description: The version number of the asset, following semantic versioning (for example, '1.0.0').

openMaterialVersion.description: The version of the ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D specification used, adhering to semantic versioning (for example, '1.0.0').

copyrights.description: Indicates copyright details, including the year and copyright holder (for example, 'Â© 2024 ACME Inc.').

license.description: Describes the license for asset distribution. Use an SPDX identifier for open-source licenses (for example, 'MIT'), or provide a URL or filename for proprietary licenses.

authors.description: Lists the author(s) of the asset as a name, email, or company.

modelCreationTool.description: Specifies the software or tool (and version) used to create the 3D model (for example, 'Blender 3.5').

creationDate.description: The date and time of asset creation, formatted as YYYYMMDDTHHMMSSZ according to ISO 8601 (for example, '20240703T101728Z').

modelingMethod.description: Indicates how the model was created, for example, '3D scan', 'photo-based modeling', or 'freehand design'.

validationDescription.description: Details the validation process used to compare the model geometry with real-world objects.

assetType.description: Specifies whether the asset represents an individual object ('object') or a collection of objects ('scene').

objectClass.description: Classifies the object type when 'assetType' is 'object', meaning, 'vehicle', 'human', 'environment', 'other'.

vehicleClassData.description: Vehicle specific data. This shall be filled if 'objectClass' is 'vehicle' based on the https://releases.asam.net/OpenSCENARIO/1.0.0/Model-Documentation/content/Vehicle.html[OpenSCENARIO XML vehicle definition].

maxSpeed.description: Maximum speed of the vehicle. Unit: meter/second.

maxAcceleration.description: Maximum acceleration of the vehicle. Unit: meter/second^2. Range: [0..inf[.

maxDeceleration.description: Maximum deceleration of the vehicle. Unit: meter/second^2. Range: [0..inf[.

axles.description: A set of the axles of a vehicle. A vehicle must have a front axle and a rear axle. It might have additional axles. The information about the rear axle is needed to transform the origin of the model to coordinate systems of other ASAM standards, for example the ASAM OpenSCENARIO XML vehicle coordinate system or the ASAM OSI host vehicle coordinate system.

additionalAxles.description: An optional array of additional axles with the same properties as 'frontAxle' and 'rearAxle'.

humanClassData.description: Human-specific data. This shall be filled if 'objectClass' is 'human' based on the https://releases.asam.net/OpenSCENARIO/1.0.0/Model-Documentation/content/Pedestrian.html[OpenSCENARIO XML pedestrian definition].

mass.description: The mass of a human. Unit: kg.

animated.description: Indicates whether the 3D model contains keyframe animations.

pbrMaterialWorkflow.description: Indicates the usage of a Physically Based Rendering (PBR) material workflow as 'metallic', 'specular' or 'none'. This only applies to the internal materials of the 3D model file, not to mapped ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D property files.

triangleCount.description: The total number of triangles in the model. A quad polygon counts as two triangles.

meshCount.description: The total number of meshes in the 3D model file. A model geometry typically consists of several sub-meshes.

textureResolutions.description: Lists all the used texture resolutions in the 3D model, meaning 'albedo', 'normal', or 'displacement' textures. Possible values are '1K', '2K', '4K'. If no textures are used in the model, add empty element ' '.

normalMapFormat.description: Specifies whether the 3D model utilizes normal maps as textures. If so, their format should be either 'DirectX' or 'OpenGL'.

boundingBox.description: Defines the Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB), which defines the spatial boundaries of an asset in a 3D space. Example: "boundingBox": { "x": [-2.5, 2.5], "y": [-1.1, 1.1],"z": [0, 1.8]}

x.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the x-axis.

y.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the y-axis.

z.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the z-axis.

materialMappingUri.description: Relative path to a material mapping file (.xomm). In this file, material names from the 3D model file or texture color codes from textures assigned in 'materialTextureAssignment' are linked to ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D property files.

materialTextureAssignment.description: Optional array containing material texture assignments. It links material names contained in the 3D model file to ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D assignment textures. In a separate material mapping file, the 'color' values in this texture are linked to ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D property files.

items.description: Name of the material in the 3D model file.
File path to the ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D assignment texture. Supported texture formats are 'png' and 'jpg'.

customProperties.description: Non-standardized asset properties for custom tools or tool chains.
